message:
在红迪又又又问贴身衣物是否分开洗？

应该相信科学还是相信传统？
这方面没和国际接轨是好是坏？
医用需要120℃蒸汽才能杀死全部孢子
对比着看下面期刊里的标准貌似有点低了
还有是日常生活需要医用标准吗？

科学：
Lakdawala (2011) puts the bacterial load reduction at reduced by 7-log, which is equal to a 99.99999% reduction, after normal laundering at 60 degrees C for 10 minutes. So this would give strong evidence to the claim that it’s perfectly fine to wash women’s underwear along with other clothing types.

Lakdawala, N., Pham, J., Shah, M., & Holton, J. (2011). Effectiveness of low-temperature domestic laundry on the decontamination of healthcare workers' uniforms. Infection Control & Hospital Epidemiology, 32(11), 1103-1108.
